head_office_address: Darchem Engineering Limited Ironmasters Way Stillington
eu_initiatives: Darchem will be visiting Brussels to have meeting with various EU Institutions and agencies and intend to apply under H2020 Funding. Project objectives: 1) Development of a new high temperature composite for aerospace & automotive applications and associated manufacturing process. 2) Manufacturing of prototype parts with lower associated costs than currently available materials. 3) Demonstrate that composite parts meet the performance and longevity requirements for the specified markets, including temperature resistance (up to 1000oC), strength and durability.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: Darchem provide engineering solutions for the high temperature needs and problems of customers in the aerospace, automotive, marine and energy sectors.
